#summary List of 3rd party Systems BigBlueButton integrates with.

== Introduction ==
If you don't see your System bellow, feel free to request an integration on our [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/ mailing list].

=== Sakai ===
Sakai is a free and open source Learning Management System. [http://confluence.sakaiproject.org/display/BBB/Home Sakai Integration]

=== Drupal ===
Is an open source Content Management System. Find the dupal module for BBB [http://drupal.org/project/bbb here]

=== Moodle ===
Moodle is a modular open source Learning Management System with a wide user base. A Moodle plug in is available [http://moodle.org/mod/data/view.php?d=13&rid=3524&filter=1 here]

=== Ruby Gem ===
To help you integrate !BigBlueButton with your Ruby on Rails app, a ruby gem is [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebuttongem/ available]

=== Chrome extension ===
To help with development and testing, or if you just want to learn quickly how the !BigBlueButton API works, download the !BigBlueButton Chrome [https://chrome.google.com/extensions/detail/ncbonhmhjnamefpmmjdpbohnkbeliehb extension].
